articles.title: How many funds should you add to your mutual fund portfolio? - Mint
articles.description: Investors often feel that if they invest in 10 to 15 funds or even more then they are well-diversified.Experts say 8 funds are enough and explain where you should invest
articles.content: When you invest in only one particular asset - stock, gold, mutual fund, fixed income instruments - you are taking too much risk by concentrating your portfolio. And this risk can be reduced by diver… [+2595 chars]

articles.title: Airtel to shutdown copper network; to offer only fiber broadband: Gopal Vittal - ETTelecom.com
articles.description: Bharti Airtel said that it will shutdown down its copper infrastructure in a year's time and will just offer Fiber-to-the Home in the country.
